import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent, Typography, Grid } from '@material-ui/core'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import cx from 'classnames'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; const Info = ({ data: { confirmed, recovered, deaths, lastUpdate } }) => { if (!confirmed) { return 'Loading...'; } return (
Infected Total active cases of the CoronaVirus. {new Date(lastUpdate).toString()} Recovered Total recoveries from the CoronaVirus.
Last updated:
> {new Date(lastUpdate).toString()} Deaths Total deaths caused by the CoronaVirus. {new Date(lastUpdate).toString()} Total deaths caused by the CoronaVirus.
); }; export default Info;
